name: SEATEXT FREE Translation and Conversion Rate Boost
author: Seatext.com

sections.description:
üåéFREE website translation in 125+ languages ü§ñ AI increases your conversion rate by AI A/B testing ü§ôPerfect for WooCommerce¬†Elementor¬†Divi

üåü Key Features

üåç Free, Unlimited Translations to 125 Languages
Reach a global audience with AI-powered, A/B tested translations. No limits‚Äîtranslate any number of languages, for any number of pages, and accommodate unlimited views of your website.

üìà AI-Driven Conversion Rate Optimization (AI CRO)
Increase your sales by up to 35% with our AI that generates and A/B tests over 1,000 text variants to identify the most effective wording for driving conversions.

üõçÔ∏è AI-Optimized Product Descriptions
Perfect for WooCommerce stores! Automatically generate and A/B test multiple product description variants to boost sales by up to 40%.

üë§ AI Website Personalization
Create tailored content for each visitor in real-time, leveraging available data to predict the most effective text variants for engagement and conversions.

üì± AI-Powered Mobile Optimization
Ensure flawless performance on mobile devices with AI that automatically rewrites and A/B tests content for optimal mobile readability and conversions.

üéõÔ∏è 100% Control Over AI
Maintain full control. Edit any AI-generated text, modify translations, or halt any AI process at your discretion.

üîå Easy Installation and Setup
Get started in minutes. Simply install the plugin, register with Seatext, and watch the AI transform your site.

Perfect for:
* E-commerce stores (WooCommerce)
* Corporate websites
* Blogs and news sites
* SaaS platforms
* Online marketplaces

Plugin Dependency on Seatext & Calling Files Remotely

This plugin relies on the Seatext service, a cloud-based AI-powered translation and optimization platform, to deliver its core functionality. The plugin itself is lightweight and primarily acts as a bridge between your WordPress site and the Seatext servers.

How it Works:

The plugin injects a small seatext.js file into your website. This script communicates with the Seatext servers to request translations, optimized content variations for A/B testing, and other AI-driven features. This means the heavy lifting, including AI processing and content generation, happens on Seatext’s infrastructure, not your WordPress server.

User Interaction with Seatext:

To manage your AI settings, view progress, edit variants, and approve AI models, you’ll need a Seatext account. You can create an account and access these features on www.seatext.com. The plugin facilitates quick installation and connection to Seatext AI, but the majority of the service is managed through the Seatext platform.

Why this Approach?

Running complex AI models directly on a WordPress server is resource-intensive and impractical. By leveraging Seatext’s cloud infrastructure, we can provide powerful AI capabilities without impacting your website’s performance. If the connection to Seatext is interrupted, your website will continue to function normally, displaying the original content.

SEATEXT: Unlock Your Website’s Global Potential with AI-Powered Translation and Conversion Optimization

Tired of juggling complex translation plugins and struggling to optimize your website for international audiences? SEATEXT offers a revolutionary solution, combining the power of AI with seamless WordPress integration. Translate your website into 125+ languages, personalize content for every visitor, and boost your conversion rates ‚Äì all within a single, powerful plugin.

Why Choose SEATEXT?

Unmatched Ease of Use: Say goodbye to complicated setup processes and technical headaches. SEATEXT is designed for simplicity. Install the plugin, connect to your SEATEXT account, and watch as your website transforms into a multilingual powerhouse. No coding required.

AI-Powered Translation That Converts: SEATEXT goes beyond basic translation. Our AI engine not only translates your content accurately but also optimizes it for conversions. We leverage cutting-edge machine learning models trained on vast amounts of conversion data, ensuring that your translated content resonates with your target audience and drives results.

Unleash the Power of Personalization: Deliver tailored website experiences to every visitor with SEATEXT’s AI-powered personalization engine. We analyze user behavior and preferences to dynamically adjust website content, maximizing engagement and boosting conversion rates. Imagine greeting each visitor in their preferred language with a personalized message ‚Äì SEATEXT makes it possible.

WooCommerce Integration for E-commerce Success: Supercharge your WooCommerce store with SEATEXT’s specialized e-commerce features. Automatically translate and optimize product descriptions, category pages, and checkout processes, creating a seamless shopping experience for international customers. Watch your global sales soar as you remove language barriers and connect with customers worldwide.

SEO Optimized for Global Visibility: SEATEXT follows SEO best practices for multilingual websites, ensuring that your translated content is indexed correctly by search engines. We automatically generate hreflang tags, create language-specific URLs, and translate metadata, maximizing your website’s visibility in international search results.

Complete Control and Flexibility: While SEATEXT’s AI handles the heavy lifting, you retain full control over your website’s content. Edit translations, adjust AI settings, and customize the language switcher to match your brand’s aesthetic.

Built for Speed and Performance: We understand that website speed is critical. SEATEXT is designed to be lightweight and efficient, minimizing impact on your website’s loading times.

Migrate from Other Translation Plugins with Ease: Switching from another translation plugin? SEATEXT makes migration simple. Our intuitive interface and comprehensive documentation guide you through the process, ensuring a smooth transition.

Key Features at a Glance:

125+ Languages: Reach a global audience with support for a vast array of languages.

AI-Powered Translation and Optimization: Translate and optimize your content for maximum impact.

Website Personalization: Deliver tailored experiences for every visitor.

WooCommerce Integration: Boost your global e-commerce sales.

SEO Optimization: Maximize your website’s visibility in international search results.

Full Control and Flexibility: Maintain control over your content and settings.

Fast and Efficient: Minimize impact on website performance.

Easy Migration: Switch from other translation plugins seamlessly.

Go Beyond Translation ‚Äì Transform Your Website with SEATEXT

SEATEXT isn’t just a translation plugin ‚Äì it’s a complete solution for global website optimization. Start your free trial today and experience the difference AI can make for your business.

More than just words:

Visual Contextual Editor: Translate directly on your website with our intuitive visual editor, ensuring accuracy and context.

Glossary and Translation Memory: Maintain consistency and save time with our built-in glossary and translation memory features.

Team Collaboration: Work seamlessly with your team on translations and content updates.

Professional Translation Services: Access a network of professional translators directly within the SEATEXT platform.

Dedicated Support: Our expert support team is here to help you every step of the way.

Important Links:
* Seatext License Agreement/AI usage policy

By using this plugin, you agree to Seatext’s terms and policies. Please review these documents to understand how your data and content are managed, protected, and optimized.

If you decide to stop using Seatext, your website will no longer be translated or optimized by our AI. You can export all your translations and optimized content using our import/export feature before discontinuing the service. For assistance, contact our support team at sgluhov@seatext.com.

Recommended Translation Alternatives:
While we believe SEATEXT is the best choice for translating your website, you may also want to explore these popular translation plugins as alternatives:

WPML A powerful and flexible multilingual plugin that allows for complete control over your website’s translations.
Polylang Offers a user-friendly interface for creating a multilingual WordPress site with support for various languages.
TranslatePress:] An intuitive visual translation plugin that lets you translate your entire site directly from the front end.
GTranslate A plugin that uses Google Translate to provide multilingual capabilities for your website.
MultilingualPress A unique approach that creates a separate site for each language while allowing easy management through a single WordPress installation.
Weglot An easy-to-use solution that offers automatic translations and allows you to customize your content in multiple languages.
These plugins are excellent options for those seeking translation solutions, but we encourage you to give SEATEXT a try for its unique features and ease of use!

Supported Languages

Afrikaans, Akan, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bambara, Bashkir, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bosnian, Brazilian Portuguese, Bulgarian, Burmese, Catalan, Cebuano, Chichewa, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Corsican, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, German, Greek, English, Esperanto, Estonian, Finnish, Fijian, Filipino, French, French Canadian, Western Frisian, Scottish Gaelic, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Hmong, Hungarian, Hawaiian, Icelandic, Igbo, Indonesian, Inuktitut, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Central Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Korean, Kurdish, Kyrgyz, Latin, Luganda, Luxembourgish, Lao, Lithuanian, Latvian, Macedonian, Malagasy, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, MƒÅori, Mongolian, Marathi, Nepali, Norwegian, Oromo, Pashto, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Serbian (Latin), Samoan, Serbian (Cyrillic), Sindhi, Sinhalese, Slovak, Slovenian, Shona, Somali, Southern Sotho, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tamil, Tajik, Tagalog, Tahitian, Tatar, Telugu, Thai, Tibetan, Tigrinya, Tongan, Turkish, Turkmen, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Xhosa, Yiddish, Yoruba, Zulu
sections.installation:
1. Upload the seatext.zip folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Register with Seatext when prompted
  4. Access the Seatext AI settings page to customize your preferences
sections.faq:
Is Seatext AI free to use?

Yes, Seatext AI offers a free plan with unlimited translations and all AI features. The free plan displays a Seatext ad on exit intent for about 10% of your visitors after your account spends the $20 welcome bonus. Premium plans remove this advertising entirely.

Will Seatext AI slow down my website?

No, Seatext AI is designed to be lightweight and efficient. Our servers typically respond with translated or rewritten content within 80 ms. If Seatext is impossible to connect, your website should work normally.

Can I use Seatext AI with other plugins?

Yes, Seatext AI is compatible with other translation software and A/B testing platforms, including popular e-commerce solutions like WooCommerce.

How can I contact Seatext support?

Visit www.seatext.com for support documentation and contact information.
sections.changelog:
2.0.0

Initial version

2.0.1

Fixed wordpress listings

2.0.3

seatext.js use much less CPU

2.0.4

small bugs fixed

3.0.0

3.0.0 update – now Seatext properly works with WordPress accelerators like Litespeed, more themes support. All users must update to this version as seatext.js also changed.

3.0.1

3.0.1 update – Bug fixes

We analyze user behavior and preferences to dynamically adjust website content, maximizing engagement and boosting conversion rates. Imagine greeting each visitor in their preferred language with a personalized message ‚Äì SEATEXT makes it possible.

WooCommerce Integration for E-commerce Success: Supercharge your WooCommerce store with SEATEXT’s specialized e-commerce features. Automatically translate and optimize product descriptions, category pages, and checkout processes, creating a seamless shopping experience for international customers. Watch your global sales soar as you remove language barriers and connect with customers worldwide.

SEO Optimized for Global Visibility: SEATEXT follows SEO best practices for multilingual websites, ensuring that your translated content is indexed correctly by search engines. We automatically generate hreflang tags, create language-specific URLs, and translate metadata, maximizing your website’s visibility in international search results.

Complete Control and Flexibility: While SEATEXT’s AI handles the heavy lifting, you retain full control over your website’s content. Edit translations, adjust AI settings, and customize the language switcher to match your brand’s aesthetic.

Built for Speed and Performance: We understand that website speed is critical. SEATEXT is designed to be lightweight and efficient, minimizing impact on your website’s loading times.

Migrate from Other Translation Plugins with Ease: Switching from another translation plugin? SEATEXT makes migration simple. Our intuitive interface and comprehensive documentation guide you through the process, ensuring a smooth transition.

Key Features at a Glance:

125+ Languages: Reach a global audience with support for a vast array of languages.

AI-Powered Translation and Optimization: Translate and optimize your content for maximum impact.

Website Personalization: Deliver tailored experiences for every visitor.

WooCommerce Integration: Boost your global e-commerce sales.

SEO Optimization: Maximize your website’s visibility in international search results.

Full Control and Flexibility: Maintain control over your content and settings.

Fast and Efficient: Minimize impact on website performance.

Easy Migration: Switch from other translation plugins seamlessly.

Go Beyond Translation ‚Äì Transform Your Website with SEATEXT

SEATEXT isn’t just a translation plugin ‚Äì it’s a complete solution for global website optimization. Start your free trial today and experience the difference AI can make for your business.

More than just words:

Visual Contextual Editor: Translate directly on your website with our intuitive visual editor, ensuring accuracy and context.

Glossary and Translation Memory: Maintain consistency and save time with our built-in glossary and translation memory features.

Team Collaboration: Work seamlessly with your team on translations and content updates.

Professional Translation Services: Access a network of professional translators directly within the SEATEXT platform.

Dedicated Support: Our expert support team is here to help you every step of the way.

Important Links:
* Seatext License Agreement/AI usage policy

By using this plugin, you agree to Seatext’s terms and policies. Please review these documents to understand how your data and content are managed, protected, and optimized.

If you decide to stop using Seatext, your website will no longer be translated or optimized by our AI. You can export all your translations and optimized content using our import/export feature before discontinuing the service. For assistance, contact our support team at sgluhov@seatext.com.

Recommended Translation Alternatives:
While we believe SEATEXT is the best choice for translating your website, you may also want to explore these popular translation plugins as alternatives:

WPML A powerful and flexible multilingual plugin that allows for complete control over your website’s translations.
Polylang Offers a user-friendly interface for creating a multilingual WordPress site with support for various languages.
TranslatePress:] An intuitive visual translation plugin that lets you translate your entire site directly from the front end.
GTranslate A plugin that uses Google Translate to provide multilingual capabilities for your website.
MultilingualPress A unique approach that creates a separate site for each language while allowing easy management through a single WordPress installation.
Weglot An easy-to-use solution that offers automatic translations and allows you to customize your content in multiple languages.
These plugins are excellent options for those seeking translation solutions, but we encourage you to give SEATEXT a try for its unique features and ease of use!

Supported Languages
